HintText: The defendant's defence must be in a document in the following format: pdf, doc, docx, jpg, jpeg, xls, xlsx, or png, and with a maximum size of 10MB. It must also contain the following statement of truth: “I believe the facts set out above to be true. I understand that proceedings for contempt of court may be brought against anyone who makes, or causes to be made, a false statement in a document verified by a statement of truth without an honest belief in its truth.”
